name: DOVEPromises
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a dove promise
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Inspire yourself with a daily dose of DOVE Promises. Unwrap the wisdom -- and joy! -- within.

Enable this skill and say, "Alexa, open a DOVE Promise" to hear one of the many inspiring messages found inside. You might even get a surprise, such as a fun fact about chocolate or an entertaining sound effect.

Indulge yourself and consume this skill (and, perhaps, a real DOVE Promise) every day!

Pleasure infuses life with passion, inspiration and purpose. And we embrace that spirit, crafting our chocolate to unlock pleasure from the very first silky smooth bite. Join us in choosing pleasure every day. And living life fully with no regrets.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
